parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the domain where you want to list policy grants.

parameters.name: entityIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the entity for which you want to list policy grants.

parameters.name: entityType
parameters.description: The type of entity for which you want to list policy grants.

parameters.name: policyType
parameters.description: The type of policy that you want to list.

nested_items.name: grantList
nested_items.description: The results of this action - the listed grants.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: Specifies the timestamp at which policy grant member was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: Specifies the user who created the policy grant member.

nested_items.name: addToProjectMemberPool
nested_items.description: Specifies that the policy grant is to be added to the members of the project.

nested_items.name: includeChildDomainUnits
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the policy grant is applied to child domain units.

nested_items.name: createAssetType
nested_items.description: Specifies that this is a create asset type policy.

nested_items.name: includeChildDomainUnits
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the policy grant is applied to child domain units.

nested_items.name: createDomainUnit
nested_items.description: Specifies that this is a create domain unit policy.

nested_items.name: includeChildDomainUnits
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the policy grant is applied to child domain units.

nested_items.name: createEnvironment
nested_items.description: Specifies that this is a create environment policy.

nested_items.name: createEnvironmentFromBlueprint
nested_items.description: The details of the policy of creating an environment.

nested_items.name: createEnvironmentProfile
nested_items.description: Specifies that this is a create environment profile policy.

nested_items.name: domainUnitId
nested_items.description: The ID of the domain unit.

nested_items.name: createFormType
nested_items.description: Specifies that this is a create form type policy.

nested_items.name: includeChildDomainUnits
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the policy grant is applied to child domain units.

nested_items.name: createGlossary
nested_items.description: Specifies that this is a create glossary policy.

nested_items.name: includeChildDomainUnits
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the policy grant is applied to child domain units.

nested_items.name: createProject
nested_items.description: Specifies that this is a create project policy.

nested_items.name: includeChildDomainUnits
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the policy grant is applied to child domain units.

nested_items.name: createProjectFromProjectProfile
nested_items.description: Specifies whether to create a project from project profile.

nested_items.name: includeChildDomainUnits
nested_items.description: Specifies whether to include child domain units when creating a project from project profile policy grant details.

nested_items.name: projectProfiles
nested_items.description: Specifies project profiles when creating a project from project profile policy grant details.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: delegateCreateEnvironmentProfile
nested_items.description: Specifies that this is the delegation of the create environment profile policy.

nested_items.name: overrideDomainUnitOwners
nested_items.description: Specifies whether to override domain unit owners.

nested_items.name: includeChildDomainUnits
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the policy is inherited by child domain units.

nested_items.name: overrideProjectOwners
nested_items.description: Specifies whether to override project owners.

nested_items.name: includeChildDomainUnits
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the policy is inherited by child domain units.

nested_items.name: useAssetType
nested_items.description: Specifies the domain unit(s) whose projects can use this asset type while creating asset or asset revisions.

nested_items.name: domainUnitId
nested_items.description: The ID of the domain unit.

nested_items.name: principal
nested_items.description: The principal of the policy grant member.

nested_items.name: domainUnit
nested_items.description: The domain unit of the policy grant principal.

nested_items.name: domainUnitDesignation
nested_items.description: Specifes the designation of the domain unit users.

nested_items.name: domainUnitGrantFilter
nested_items.description: The grant filter for the domain unit.

nested_items.name: allDomainUnitsGrantFilter
nested_items.description: Specifies a grant filter containing all domain units.

nested_items.name: domainUnitIdentifier
nested_items.description: The ID of the domain unit.

nested_items.name: groupIdentifier
nested_items.description: The ID Of the group of the group principal.

nested_items.name: projectDesignation
nested_items.description: The project designation of the project policy grant principal.

nested_items.name: projectGrantFilter
nested_items.description: The project grant filter of the project policy grant principal.

nested_items.name: domainUnitFilter
nested_items.description: The domain unit filter of the project grant filter.

nested_items.name: domainUnit
nested_items.description: The domain unit ID to use in the filter.

nested_items.name: includeChildDomainUnits
nested_items.description: Specifies whether to include child domain units.

nested_items.name: projectIdentifier
nested_items.description: The project ID of the project policy grant principal.

nested_items.name: allUsersGrantFilter
nested_items.description: The all users grant filter of the user policy grant principal.

nested_items.name: userIdentifier
nested_items.description: The user ID of the user policy grant principal.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: When the number of grants is greater than the default value for the MaxResults parameter, or if you explicitly specify a value for MaxResults that is less than the number of grants, the response includes a pagination token named NextToken. You can specify this NextToken value in a subsequent call to ListPolicyGrants to list the next set of grants.
